name: Fall Festival Mini Pumpkins
description: Knit cute mini pumpkins for your fall décor. Use one of our suggested stitch patterns or create one of your own. One mini hank will create one mini pumpkin.
full_text: Knit cute mini pumpkins for your fall décor. Use one of our suggested stitch patterns or create one of your own. One mini hank will create one mini pumpkin. EXPERIENCE LEVEL Advanced Beginner MATERIALS WOOLSTOK (WORSTED) BUNDLE (100% Fine Highland Wool, 21 mini hanks; 5g/12yds): 1 bundle (Fall Festival) Cinnamon stick (for stem) Stitch marker Stuffing Tapestry needle FINISHED MEASURMENTS CIRCUMFERENCE: 6” after stuffing HEIGHT: 1” after cinching COLOR SHOWN Moss Green No. 1326 Earth Ivy No. 1309 Gravel Road No. 1302 Drift Wood No. 1312 Highland Fleece No. 1303 Ember Glow No. 1323 Rusted Roof No. 1311
